verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Speak <WH559> unto <WH413> the priests <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, There shall none <WH3808> be defiled <WH2930> for the dead <WH5315> among his people: <WH5971>

But <WH3588> <WH518> for his kin, <WH7607> that is near <WH7138> unto <WH413> him, that is, for his mother, <WH517> and for his father, <WH1> and for his son, <WH1121> and for his daughter, <WH1323> and for his brother, <WH251>
And for his sister <WH269> a virgin, <WH1330> that is nigh <WH7138> unto <WH413> him, which <WH834> hath had <WH1961> no <WH3808> husband; <WH376> for her may he be defiled. <WH2930>
But he shall not <WH3808> defile himself, <WH2930> being a chief man <WH1167> among his people, <WH5971> to profane himself. <WH2490>

They shall not <WH3808> make <WH7139> baldness <WH7144> upon their head, <WH7218> neither <WH3808> shall they shave off <WH1548> the corner <WH6285> of their beard, <WH2206> nor <WH3808> make <WH8295> any cuttings <WH8296> in their flesh. <WH1320>

They shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6918> unto their God, <WH430> and not <WH3808> profane <WH2490> the name <WH8034> of their God: <WH430> for <WH3588> <WH853> the offerings of the LORD made by fire, <WH801> <WH3068> and the bread <WH3899> of their God, <WH430> they <WH1992> do offer: <WH7126> therefore they shall be <WH1961> holy. <WH6944>

They shall not <WH3808> take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> that is a whore, <WH2181> or profane; <WH2491> neither <WH3808> shall they take <WH3947> a woman <WH802> put away <WH1644> from her husband: <WH4480> <WH376> for <WH3588> he <WH1931> is holy <WH6918> unto his God. <WH430>

Thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> him therefore; for <WH3588> he <WH1931> offereth <WH7126> <WH853> the bread <WH3899> of thy God: <WH430> he shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6918> unto thee: for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD, <WH3068> which sanctify <WH6942> you, am holy. <WH6918>

And the daughter <WH1323> of any <WH376> priest, <WH3548> if <WH3588> she profane herself <WH2490> by playing the whore, <WH2181> she <WH1931> profaneth <WH2490> <WH853> her father: <WH1> she shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>

And he that is the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> among his brethren, <WH4480> <WH251> upon <WH5921> whose <WH834> head <WH7218> the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> was poured, <WH3332> and that is consecrated <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> to put on <WH3847> <WH853> the garments, <WH899> shall not <WH3808> uncover <WH6544> <WH853> his head, <WH7218> nor <WH3808> rend <WH6533> his clothes; <WH899>
Neither <WH3808> shall he go in <WH935> to <WH5921> any <WH3605> dead <WH4191> body, <WH5315> nor <WH3808> defile himself <WH2930> for his father, <WH1> or for his mother; <WH517>

Neither <WH3808> shall he go out <WH3318> of <WH4480> the sanctuary, <WH4720> nor <WH3808> profane <WH2490> <WH853> the sanctuary <WH4720> of his God; <WH430> for <WH3588> the crown <WH5145> of the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> of his God <WH430> is upon <WH5921> him: I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>
And he <WH1931> shall take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> in her virginity. <WH1331>

A widow, <WH490> or a divorced woman, <WH1644> or profane, <WH2491> or a harlot, <WH2181> <WH853> these <WH428> shall he not <WH3808> take: <WH3947> but <WH3588> <WH518> he shall take <WH3947> a virgin <WH1330> of his own people <WH4480> <WH5971> to wife. <WH802>
Neither <WH3808> shall he profane <WH2490> his seed <WH2233> among his people: <WH5971> for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> him.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559> Whosoever <WH376> <WH834> he be of thy seed <WH4480> <WH2233> in their generations <WH1755> that hath <WH1961> any blemish, <WH3971> let him not <WH3808> approach <WH7126> to offer <WH7126> the bread <WH3899> of his God. <WH430>

For <WH3588> whatsoever <WH3605> man <WH376> he be that <WH834> hath a blemish, <WH3971> he shall not <WH3808> approach: <WH7126> a blind <WH5787> man, <WH376> or <WH176> a lame, <WH6455> or <WH176> he that hath a flat nose, <WH2763> or <WH176> any thing superfluous, <WH8311>
Or <WH176> a man <WH376> that <WH834> is <WH1961> broken-footed, <WH7667> <WH7272> or <WH176> broken-handed, <WH7667> <WH3027>

Or <WH176> crookbacked, <WH1384> or <WH176> a dwarf, <WH1851> or <WH176> that hath a blemish <WH8400> in his eye, <WH5869> or <WH176> be scurvy, <WH1618> or <WH176> scabbed, <WH3217> or <WH176> hath his stones <WH810> broken; <WH4790>

No <WH3808> <WH3605> man <WH376> that <WH834> hath a blemish <WH3971> of the seed <WH4480> <WH2233> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> shall come nigh <WH5066> to offer <WH7126> <WH853> the offerings of the LORD made by fire: <WH801> <WH3068> he hath a blemish; <WH3971> he shall not <WH3808> come nigh <WH5066> to offer <WH7126> <WH853> the bread <WH3899> of his God. <WH430>
He shall eat <WH398> the bread <WH3899> of his God, <WH430> both of the most holy, <WH4480> <WH6944> <WH6944> and of <WH4480> the holy. <WH6944>

Only <WH389> he shall not <WH3808> go in <WH935> unto <WH413> the veil, <WH6532> nor <WH3808> come nigh <WH5066> unto <WH413> the altar, <WH4196> because <WH3588> he hath a blemish; <WH3971> that he profane <WH2490> not <WH3808> <WH853> my sanctuaries: <WH4720> for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> them.
And Moses <WH4872> told <WH1696> it unto <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> and to <WH413> his sons, <WH1121> and unto <WH413> all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
